title: unicode encoding fiascos on a sample CentOS system
body:
Well, the system is somewhat unique, which lead to a number of recent issues/workarounds at git-annex level, see e.g. [xattr issue](https://git-annex.branchable.com/bugs/__34__357_out_of_984_tests_failed__34___on_NFS_lustre_mount/) but these particular ones seems to be all relating to some assumptions we have where we either need to instrument tests a bit differently or address them some other way

<details>
<summary>selection of tests failures all of some UnicodeEncodeError</summary> 

```shell
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.support.tests.test_globbedpaths.test_globbedpaths
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/dartfs-hpc/rc/home/v/d31548v/.conda/envs/datalad/lib/python3.9/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/dartfs-hpc/rc/home/v/d31548v/.conda/envs/datalad/lib/python3.9/site-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 583, in _wrap_with_tree
    create_tree(d, tree, archives_leading_dir=archives_leading_dir)
  File "/dartfs-hpc/rc/home/v/d31548v/.conda/envs/datalad/lib/python3.9/site-packages/datalad/utils.py", line 2420, in create_tree
    with open_func(full_name, "wb") as f:
UnicodeEncodeError: 'latin-1' codec can't encode character '\u03b2' in position 90: ordinal not in range(256)
```
